interestingFact: Pakistan has the second largest salt mine in the world (Khewra Salt Mine).
The Great Wall of China is one of the longest structures ever built.
The United States consists of 50 states.USA is a super power.
London has one of the oldest underground railway systems.
Japan is famous for its high-speed bullet trains.
Germany is known for its autobahns with no speed limits in some areas.
The Eiffel Tower is repainted every 7 years to prevent rust.
Turkey is located in both Europe and Asia continents.
Saudi Arabia is home to the two holiest cities in Islam, Makkah and Madinah.
